snippet.title: Sauna2000 Wishlist trailer EEK3 2022
snippet.description:
Wishlist Sauna2000 now! 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410470/Sauna2000/?beta=0



What is sauna2000 - Autumn Night Prelude?

Is it the full Sauna2000 game? -No. 

What is it?

-This is a standalone experience that serves as an introduction to the full game. 
In the Autumn Night Prelude, the Sauna2000 demo from 2020 is reframed and given greater context for the full Sauna2000 game.
The story content of the Prelude is not the same as in the original demo, it’s much larger in scale and introduces players to the new gameplay style and world of Muhvijärvi.
As we’ve worked on the full Sauna2000, all this time we’ve been actively referencing the original Demo-disc 2020 demo. Even we find the original demo to be a mystery, and we have tried to make sense of it and how those events fit into the overall story of the full game. 
Similarly to the original demo, Autumn Night Prelude will be a smaller scale, just Jaska in his yard heating his sauna as the sun sets. However, you get to decide how things go down this time. Just like in the full game, you decide whether the events turn into horror or not. The Autumn Night Prelude will mostly take place in Jaska's yard, but you will discover other locations as you progress through the prelude. As well this time, the autumn evening will be filled with 100% more Erkki! The original demo didn't have Erkki! He'll definitely add some spice to the proceedings! Having worked on the game for so long without being able to give out anything playable, we think Autumn Night Prelude is a great way to get you playing Sauna2000 before we launch our full size game early access.
